thread.title: New-look Buffalo Sabres seek to put past woes behind
thread.title_full: New-look Buffalo Sabres seek to put past woes behind

title: New-look Buffalo Sabres seek to put past woes behind
text: > Sports New-look Buffalo Sabres seek to put past woes behind FILE - In this Sept. 29, 2015, file photo, Toronto Maple Leafs forward Connor Brown (61) deflects the puck at Buffalo Sabres goaltender Robin Lehner (40), of Sweden, during the second period of a preseason NHL hockey game in Buffalo, N.Y. Buffalo Sabres general manager Tim Murray solidified Lehner from Ottawa, contributing to one of NHL's most radically changed lineups entering this season. (AP Photo/Gary Wiepert, File)
